businessProfile.name: Ronetti's Pizza
businessProfile.address: 23 S Main St, London, OH 43140, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 23 S Main St, London, OH 43140, USA

reviews.text: This was our first time getting food from Ronetti's Pizza. I've always heard nothing but good things about their establishment, so I wanted to give them a try. We ordered an XL Ultimate pizza, a large pepperoni & cheese pizza, and a half order of crispy plain wings (wings not pictured). The wings were perfect. I asked for crispy, and they made sure they were. They don't skimp on toppings for the most part, as you can see. My only complaint would be that the cheese seems to be lacking. It's not a big issue at all. I know now to maybe get extra cheese next time. The flavor of the sauce is just right. It's not too sweet, and it's not too bitter. It sits somewhere in the middle. There is a bit of spice. I assume it's the pepperoni that's giving that off. It wasn't overpowering, but if you're sensitive to spicy food, I'd recommend something else topping wise. All in all, we'd gladly order here again!

Placed a pickup order through Toast. I arrived a couple minutes before scheduled time. The order was ready and correct. The server who waited on me was cordial and timely. We order just about the same items every time. Large pep and mushroom pizza with a Super sub. Both were delicious! Ronettis pizza sauce is a little thick, we love it! Only minor issue was the sausage on the super sub was not chopped very well. There were some really big chunks of it. My hubby loves sausage so I just moved the bigger chunks to his half. My favorite thing is that the orders are correct and ready when they say it will be. We always do pick up though. They started a new text program so by signing up for texts, I received a 20% off coupon which was awesome. In general I would say their prices are comparable to other pizza shops in the area and are fair for the potions you get. Great job Ronettis!

The home made chips are amazing along with the super sub .
Great service

Had hi hopes since all the pics showed pretty good looking food. But my pizza was wrong and burnt and my sub was wrong and burnt. I paid extra for ham on my sub didn't get it . Paid for double cheese and extra pizza sauce on pizza and didn't get it . I have a pic of sub but threw away the pizza so didn't get a pic of it. A waste of 38 bucks. Never again.

Hello ,  my pizza is always made perfectly!
I haven‚Äôt ever had an issue at all and Ronettis always maintains an excellent pizza ! Thank you !

recentReviews.text: My first and last order. A large pizza with 5 toppings. I could not eat it because it was very over baked, almost burned. Edges were burned. Very stingy and ungenerous with toppings, and do not give senior discount on carry out.
Very friendly people and they work hard to keep customers happy
Ordered delivery and cauliflower crust. It's so dang good!!!
We highly recommend Ronettis Pizza! Their cowboy bites are just as amazing as their pizza

Hello ,  my pizza is always made perfectly!
I haven‚Äôt ever had an issue at all and Ronettis always maintains an excellent pizza ! Thank you !
The person who was serving me did a good job. I felt like he cared that I was sitting a minute which made it not so bad.

detailedReviews.author: John P
detailedReviews.text: My first and last order. A large pizza with 5 toppings. I could not eat it because it was very over baked, almost burned. Edges were burned. Very stingy and ungenerous with toppings, and do not give senior discount on carry out.

detailedReviews.author: William Rogers
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly people and they work hard to keep customers happy

detailedReviews.author: David Walter
detailedReviews.text: Ordered delivery and cauliflower crust. It's so dang good!!!

detailedReviews.author: Jenny Shunk
detailedReviews.text: We highly recommend Ronettis Pizza! Their cowboy bites are just as amazing as their pizza

Hello ,  my pizza is always made perfectly!

detailedReviews.author: ronda thiel
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!!!

detailedReviews.author: sandra charles
detailedReviews.text: Pizza and salads are always awesome. Great service.

detailedReviews.author: Gabbie Nugeness
detailedReviews.text: Very nice employees, very quick and efficient, very good food!

detailedReviews.author: audrey powers
detailedReviews.text: Placed a pickup order through Toast. I arrived a couple minutes before scheduled time. The order was ready and correct. The server who waited on me was cordial and timely. We order just about the same items every time. Large pep and mushroom pizza with a Super sub. Both were delicious! Ronettis pizza sauce is a little thick, we love it! Only minor issue was the sausage on the super sub was not chopped very well. There were some really big chunks of it. My hubby loves sausage so I just moved the bigger chunks to his half. My favorite thing is that the orders are correct and ready when they say it will be. We always do pick up though. They started a new text program so by signing up for texts, I received a 20% off coupon which was awesome. In general I would say their prices are comparable to other pizza shops in the area and are fair for the potions you get. Great job Ronettis!

detailedReviews.author: ThatGuyNich
detailedReviews.text: Super sub still got it. Friendly, local place with the best sub in town.

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Phillips
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: David
detailedReviews.text: Amazing, hands down one of the best pizza places I have ate at!!! Definitely come here!!! Also Jenna C was excellent and recommended the breadsticks, thank you Jenna you are amazing!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Jenkins
detailedReviews.text:
The home made chips are amazing along with the super sub .
Great service

detailedReviews.author: nicholas penwell
detailedReviews.text: Food was amazing me and my coworkers got the bacon cheese fries a side salad and a sub as well as a Pizza and everything was amazing. Huge shout out to my waitress as well I clicked to add a tip and I clicked to add a way way larger then normal amount then usual the young lady working stopped me as I was getting to my vehicle and asked if I met to do so and I advised I did not even tho the service was well worth it and the food as well a 116% tip was a lot for anyone lol we fixed the bill and I took care of the young lady. 5 stars all around we will be back for sure.

detailedReviews.author: Alex Dunkley
detailedReviews.text: The food is great.  Wings are amazing!!

detailedReviews.author: Anna Presley
detailedReviews.text:
Edit: I decided to give them another chance after they reached out to make things right, and I‚Äôm so glad I did! I had forgotten just how incredible their pizza is. Everything was cooked to perfection, including the breadsticks! The girl who assisted me at checkout was friendly and attentive! While the previous staff member who had caused the issue was still not the best. Overall, you won‚Äôt find better pizza in the area. I‚Äôm willing to drive 35 minutes just to enjoy a meal from here.

Ronetties has been my go to pizza for years.  I don‚Äôt know what has happened. Tonight I ordered pizza and when I go to pick it up they had forgot to send the order through (of course they tell me that after I pay) they tell me it will be about 10-15 minutes but they will get it right to me.  15 minutes go by and then I check they say it will be another 10 minutes.  I just ask for a refund because I don‚Äôt have time to wait‚Ä¶two hours go by and they call me!! Saying my card declined and would I like to pay for it now‚Ä¶..I DIDNT GET FOOD! (You can see where it came off and then refunded).  I try to over look ordering breadsticks and they are always burnt. You can definitely tell what kind of service and food you will get (or won‚Äôt get!) by who‚Äôs working and it‚Äôs not worth the risk anymore.  Please get it together because when you have the correct staff working it‚Äôs amazing and worth the drive.

detailedReviews.author: Shyanne Salyers
detailedReviews.text: Amazing customer service. Amazing food what more could you ask for highly recommend their chili

detailedReviews.author: Greg Eades
detailedReviews.text: My favorite sub place!  I'm never disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Samuel Gantner (Enlightened101)
detailedReviews.text: Good food at great prices

detailedReviews.author: Kay Potter
detailedReviews.text: Had hi hopes since all the pics showed pretty good looking food. But my pizza was wrong and burnt and my sub was wrong and burnt. I paid extra for ham on my sub didn't get it . Paid for double cheese and extra pizza sauce on pizza and didn't get it . I have a pic of sub but threw away the pizza so didn't get a pic of it. A waste of 38 bucks. Never again.

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Schmidt
detailedReviews.text: Subs are the best subs in london ohio!, they always load up the subs and they taste great, the pizza is OK mostly burnt half the time, we mostly get subs and they taste great 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Melissa
detailedReviews.text: This was our first time getting food from Ronetti's Pizza. I've always heard nothing but good things about their establishment, so I wanted to give them a try. We ordered an XL Ultimate pizza, a large pepperoni & cheese pizza, and a half order of crispy plain wings (wings not pictured). The wings were perfect. I asked for crispy, and they made sure they were. They don't skimp on toppings for the most part, as you can see. My only complaint would be that the cheese seems to be lacking. It's not a big issue at all. I know now to maybe get extra cheese next time. The flavor of the sauce is just right. It's not too sweet, and it's not too bitter. It sits somewhere in the middle. There is a bit of spice. I assume it's the pepperoni that's giving that off. It wasn't overpowering, but if you're sensitive to spicy food, I'd recommend something else topping wise. All in all, we'd gladly order here again!

detailedReviews.author: Jodi Milburn
detailedReviews.text: Best subs in townüòã

detailedReviews.author: Jeannie Pruitt
detailedReviews.text: We were introduced to Ronettis by my husband's friend so since my husband and I are in London staying with  my dad right now taking care of him one day we decided to check and get some food from there mmmmmm very good ... we've had pizza üçï  to spaghetti üçù which is out of this world with their famous meatballs to subs and wings ... Havnt  had a bad meal from this place yet that we have had.... Great job 5 thumbs up üëç  keep up that great work .... Staff is beyond friendly too that talk to u when u go in like u have known them forever.... So I suggest u stop in sometime and grab some grub

detailedReviews.author: Branden Miller
detailedReviews.text: I ordered 2 super subs. They charged $8.42 for in town delivery...the subs only cost $10 a piece!! Plus they were cold and not good at all like they used to be. Very disappointing and I don't plan on ever going back. I've been a customer for over 40 years but not any more.

detailedReviews.author: Grant Stephens
detailedReviews.text: Ordered takeout using the website and food was ok. If you want something specific or special it's probably better to call in and place the order yourself. Ordered a small pepperoni pizza with pie cut slices and a basket of breadsticks with marinara sauce. No sauce for breadsticks and pizza was square cut.

detailedReviews.author: Debra Stephenson
detailedReviews.text: Excellent chili for lunch

detailedReviews.author: Max Bender
detailedReviews.text: The only people giving this restaurant any food review above two stars are related to the owner. The ingredients are comparable to going to Kroger, buying the premade items, and tossing them into an easy bake oven . All you have to do is turn the pizza over to see that it‚Äôs not ‚Äúfresh.‚Äù  We regrettably ordered a large pepperoni and sausage pizza that was on par with gas station food.

detailedReviews.author: Tim Bebinger
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and pasta. Subs are very good as well. I have yet to try something that was not very good. Pizza is very good and plenty of toppings.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Weatherford
detailedReviews.text: Killer pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: brad pierce
detailedReviews.text: Great service. Unique pizza. We get it at least monthly. Huge treat. The cheeseburgers are amazing, too.

detailedReviews.author: Drew Williams
detailedReviews.text: Been a while so I figured I'd try again. Disappointed again. All the recent reviews are all bad. Should of listened to them

detailedReviews.author: Sandra Valdivia
detailedReviews.text: My husband & I favorite place

detailedReviews.author: Brady Hampton
detailedReviews.text: Got delivery the other night. I was the only one who liked the pizza. No one liked anything else. I didn't notice how much delivery cost until I got the receipt. They're using Doordash so it has an $8 fee. They are also charging sales tax on delivery which is absolutely ridiculous. So $10 BEFORE TIP. That was 3 nights ago. This morning we found a random delivery on our doorstep. We called the people to tell them we got their order. They said that the owner yelled at them and that he did not want their business anymore. He is not getting our business anymore either. Horrible in every way.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Steenhoek
detailedReviews.text: If you are in London OH looking for authentic made from scratch pizza, sandwiches, soups, salads, and dinners then this is a must stop. The ambiance is very warm and welcoming. Like an Italian bistro. The staff are very friendly and accommodating. They have a huge selection of pizzas and some specialty ones as well like the new hot honey and the pork and pickle.

detailedReviews.author: Kate Fout
detailedReviews.text: They accommodated our party of 25 wonderfully! Mad props to the employees for serving us!!

detailedReviews.author: Steve Saltsman
detailedReviews.text: Roast beef sandwich for the win

detailedReviews.author: Maria Jordan
detailedReviews.text: I just think it‚Äôs really funny that I didn‚Äôt receive the pizza and when I called I was told I was speaking to a manager but I was also told in a Facebook comment that it was the owner and apparently I‚Äôm ‚Äúno longer welcome‚Äù üòÇ because apparently after waiting for 20 min and the server being incapable of finding the order on her computer and since my bf didn‚Äôt realize he wasn‚Äôt given the pizza he asked for crushed red pepper and apparently stormed out after waiting another 5 minutes but he also said he didn‚Äôt tip because of that so I just wanna know why my order was $28.26 but you charged my card $33 and some change and my order really should have been $17 because I didn‚Äôt even get the pizza lol but I got hung up on and screamed at immediately for my bf ‚Äústorming out‚Äù when I tried to call and resolve the issue I didn‚Äôt know y‚Äôall needed the money that bad lmao so pathetic tbh

detailedReviews.author: Erin Linde
detailedReviews.text: We ordered salads and a pizza. The salads were basic and delivered quickly, but the pizza took SO long to come out and tasted old for some reason. Almost like a freezer burnt taste. We ordered a pizza that had jalapenos and there were WAY too many on it. It was so spicy that we were picking them off. If you love a ton of spice, this might be the pizza place for you. I'm a big fan of leftovers, but noone in our party had any desire to take the leftover pizza because it wasn't even good the first time.

detailedReviews.author: James Palmer
detailedReviews.text: I have only purchased carry out here a few times. I read reviews before I ordered and it appeared the Super Sub was pretty popular. I read the description on the menu. I ordered 3. I ordered two with no hot peppers. Which was the first clue I didn‚Äôt want anything spicy. I got them home we realized the sausage was so spicy it was burning our mouths. It was Not in any reviews nor was it on the description of the sandwich. I been around the block a few times I am 60 years old. This was not a case of just my taste buds it was extremely spicy. The ‚ÄúManager‚Äù said and I quote ‚Äúour customers don‚Äôt complain about it‚Äù well I am pretty sure due to location and size it‚Äôs a pretty well known establishment and people probably know the sausage is spicy or it was made extra spicy that day. He absolutely refused to do anything about it. I will NOT support this restaurant at any time in the future. You lost a customer. I will also tell my story any chance I get. You sir have missed an opportunity to make things right. You also need to put that you use homemade spicy sausage on your sandwiches in your description on your menu. I can‚Äôt believe they wouldn‚Äôt do anything about it when I spent 40$ there. Please realize if you have any issues there not willing to work with you in any shape or form.

detailedReviews.author: REED
detailedReviews.text: I had the hamburger and it was juicy and the portion size was great. The pricing is reasonable. We had our order to go because we didn't have time to eat there. The dining room is a good size. The staff was very friendly. They cook your food made to order which takes a little longer but, is well worth the wait. I would recommend stopping here if you are ever in the area. You won't be disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: B L
detailedReviews.text: They were a little short staffed but the food was great and it didn't cost too much either.  This place is a winner

detailedReviews.author: Jason Maxwell
detailedReviews.text: I use to love this place. I grew up with but since it has been under new ownership everything has gone down hill. Many times I would order a pizza and it got made late or made wrong. Today I order a simple order for my elderly father and I and they straight up forgot to make it and they didn't even care that they screwed up. I will never order from there again or give them any kind of good review. Go to cappys never had a problem with them

detailedReviews.author: Lewis Tristano
detailedReviews.text: Great people and food so hapoy I found them

detailedReviews.author: Darin Abbott
detailedReviews.text: Good food and good service.  Just a little pricey

detailedReviews.author: Amy George
detailedReviews.text: Great home made chips and subs. Antipasto salads are fresh, loaded with meats and veggies. Homemade Italian dressing is the best. Good service. Good food.

detailedReviews.author: Susan Kanode
detailedReviews.text: How do you order a pizza, get there to pick it up precisely in 40 minutes, and then have to wait an additional 20 minutes for a cold pizza?  Totally unacceptable!!!

detailedReviews.author: Jim Sabin
detailedReviews.text: Would like to rate the food but still waiting for it.

detailedReviews.author: Tina S
detailedReviews.text: Only 2 customers when we arrived and still waited 10 minutes before a server came out. The subs are large and taste great. The fried bologna sandwich is very minimal, not worth the cost. The fresh made chips were awesome.

detailedReviews.author: Joyce Travis
detailedReviews.text: It took an hour and a half before we got our food. I will give them another chance.

detailedReviews.author: Joyce Travis
detailedReviews.text: It was a clean and the people were very nice. We waited foe an hour and a half for our food and I was ready to get a refund but our food was already ready to eat and it was very delicious so I will give them another chance.

detailedReviews.author: Lou Tristano
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was spicy with sausage...I do t like sweet tomatoe pie ...this was really flavored well could taste garlic,basil,oregano and pepper was delicious.  Crust was perfect had a nice crunch to it and didn't taste like cardboard after being in a box for 30 minutes ...I will be back

detailedReviews.author: Scott Northup
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Nephi Sklare
detailedReviews.text: Really good Pizza and I love the sweet chili sauce for their wings.

detailedReviews.author: Cassie Evans
detailedReviews.text: The girl who rang me out on my pick up order was so polite! She even offered to help me with everything to my car. The pizza wasn‚Äôt too bad this time it typically doesn‚Äôt have enough sauce on it though. I had a steak sub and it was burnt around the edges so I had to rip those parts off to be able to eat it. While I was in the restaurant, I noticed the floor where the associates have to walk up front. Very sad you have them walking on a floor that‚Äôs all broken.

detailedReviews.author: Cris Martinez
detailedReviews.text: The service, food,prices and atmosphere were very good üëç! My wife and I will be back!

detailedReviews.author: Megan Gillespie
detailedReviews.text: Disappointed in the sub I received. The Italian sub came on a large sub bun, but only had 2 slices of salami, 1 slice of capicolla, and about 5 pepperonis. Had a very similar issue about 3 months ago. Wont be ordering subs their again, and will stick with the pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Bennington
detailedReviews.text: This is a great place to go if you are looking for a sub. Their super sub is the best sub around hands down.

detailedReviews.author: Haley J
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town! The French fries are delicious too!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Williams
detailedReviews.text: Don't get much for an $8 sandwich. Didn't taste good either. Food use to be really good here but it's awful now

detailedReviews.author: C S Bail
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza.  Their "Ultimate" is truly spectacular.  Better pizza than I've had in Chicago and New York.   Even friends from Houston or Washington D.C. are impressed when visiting.   Definitely my favorite restaurant in London, hands down.

detailedReviews.author: Mary E. Napper
detailedReviews.text: The people are real nice and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Clayton Scott
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm really disappointed, that you don‚Äôt open until 4 PM on Sunday. I wanted an alternative to cappys pizza. You were that, until I tried to order food on Sunday around 12PM. Again, you disappoint me me because of that.

detailedReviews.author: Sara Schrader
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a Hawaiian pizza for take out. I ended up not being able to eat it until 25-30 later but I thought it was still quite good. Not greasy, crisp crust and a good chew on the pie. The toppings were well distributed.

detailedReviews.author: Derrick Pollard
detailedReviews.text: Not a fan

detailedReviews.author: hamsa raju
detailedReviews.text: We baught tuna sandwich there was no lettuce onion or any sauce bread was not toasted it was so cold..I did not expect this

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.2/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love that Ronettis Pizza consistently delivers perfectly made pizzas and maintains excellent quality. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The text program offering a 20% off coupon is appreciated by customers, enhancing their experience and encouraging repeat business. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The quick and efficient service, with orders ready and correct at the promised time, is highly valued by customers. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Show customers you value their input

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
